channel.title: Teleto commands are messed up.. [PI]

item.title: Teleto commands are messed up.. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @4markie 4markie
item.description:
@4markie wrote:

[quote=“play 4 fun, post:7, topic:396808”][quote author=CreatorAlex link=topic=493970.msg3611418#msg3611418 date=1306625276]

heres mine, u can try n see if it works

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“xteletome”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {
String name = playerCommand.substring(10);
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i];
other.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel);
}
}
}
}

Sometimes I wonder… PI isn’t 500+. Which I’m like half sure that code is.
[/quote]

what do u guys mean by its 317 and not 500+?? thats my command in my source and im running a pi for a 317?
so my command is wrong or something?[/quote]

I can only help you if you answer my question.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleto commands are messed up.. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @h3rbl0re h3rbl0re
item.description:
@h3rbl0re wrote:

my mods cant do teleto commands. heres what the code is atm.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome") && c.playerRights <=1){ try { String playerToTele = playerCommand.substring(10); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToTele)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName); c2.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline.");

Read full topic
